wikipedia_page.main: William Ball Spencer (sometimes known incorrectly as William Barnett Spencer) (1854-1923) was a British marine painter. He was the son of Richard Ball Spencer.

response: A son William Ball Spencer (1854-1923) (sometimes, incorrectly known as, Richard Barnett Spencer) also became active as a ship portraitist.Biography of the artist under The Ship Deva, National Maritime Museum. Retrieved 24 September 2021
